scripts.clean: docker images | grep -E 'ivyowl/alpine-node-pupetteer' | awk '{print $3}' | xargs docker rmi
scripts.build:all: yarn clean && packageversion=`cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk '{print $2}' | sed 's/[",]//g'` && for nodeversion in 7 8 9 10; do sed -e 's/##NODE_VERSION##/'$nodeversion'/g' Dockerfile.template > Dockerfile && docker build -t ivyowl/alpine-node-pupetteer:$packageversion-$nodeversion -f Dockerfile .; done;
